mapper.select: SELECT cg.`name` AS goodsName,cg.image AS goodsPicture,cg.layer,di.goods_id ,di.quantity,di.price FROM dispatch dh LEFT JOIN dispatch_item di ON di.dispatch_id = dh.id LEFT JOIN code_goods cg ON cg.id = di.goods_id WHERE dh.dispatch_no = #{dispatchNo} ORDER BY cg.layer ASC

SELECT ss.goods_id,ss.layer,ss.quantity AS stockQuantity,ss.dispatch_quantity AS dispatchQuantity,ss.id AS shopStockId FROM dispatch dh LEFT JOIN shop_stock ss ON ss.shop_id = dh.shop_id WHERE dh.dispatch_no = #{dispatchNo}

SELECT cg.`name` AS goodsName,cg.image AS goodsPicture,cg.layer,di.goods_id ,di.quantity,di.price FROM dispatch dh LEFT JOIN dispatch_item di ON di.dispatch_id = dh.id LEFT JOIN code_goods cg ON cg.id = di.goods_id WHERE dh.dispatch_no = #{dispatchNo} AND di.goods_id NOT IN (${goodsIds}) ORDER BY cg.layer ASC
